Text: If You Use WMP It is a Piece of s*** these subs will not play on it. I highly recommend using VLC as your default media player, it is a much more reliable and versatile program.

I discovered that the English Subs are hard-coded in the movie but they're just turned off by Default.  I completely removed the NL Subs from the folder and then turned ON the English Subs and it worx perfectly!  

Thanx!
